string.text:
A backpack made of durable material able to withstand the harshest weather conditions.
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE WITH: Gunsmith weapon mod kit

A large backpack for long journeys. Thanks to the weight distribution system, it allows the wearer to carry enough supplies and equipment for a trip lasting up to five days.
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE WITH: Replacement weapon mod kit

A combat backpack used by the military, often to store additional munitions and medical supplies.
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE WITH: Duty modification kit, Freedom modification kit

A tourist's backpack with a lot of storage space. Not very popular owing to its cumbersome size.
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE WITH: Custom weapon mod kit
